content: I missed the Apple Q&A session so checking here if they mentioned how to Test Healthkit app? i.e. is there a test source for developers test their app with some synthetic clinical data. TIA

Yes – with Xcode beta 2 there are now sample accounts that you can add in Simulator. (Not available on device). Just go through the standard way to add an account and choose one of the three sample accounts.
Is there a link to the slides? I was presenting Full Stack JavaScript, and didn’t get a chance to meet up.
Would love to start working on that Cordova plugin.
Here's the video, slides and relevant links: https://developer.apple.com/videos/play/wwdc2018/706/
